mapper.insert: INSERT INTO myfarm_image_t ( farm_no, file_name, file_path, file_type, file_size, file_date ) VALUES ( #{farm_no}, #{file_name}, #{file_path}, #{file_type}, #{file_size}, (SELECT DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 9 HOUR)) )

/* 내 농장 기기 신청 */ INSERT INTO my_farm_device ( user_id, user_name, user_address, user_phone, regi_date ) VALUES ( #{user_id}, #{user_name}, #{user_address}, #{user_phone}, (SELECT DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 9 HOUR)) )
